snippet: While Lee Roy Hartung may have lacked focus as a collector, he still left behind an extensive collection of cars, motorcycles and memorabilia, which is being auctioned this week in Glenview, Ill.
lead_paragraph: While Lee Roy Hartung may have lacked focus as a collector, he still left behind an extensive collection of cars, motorcycles and memorabilia, which is being auctioned this week in Glenview, Ill.

headline.main: A Hoarder’s Collection Goes Up for Sale
